snippet.title: [Greetings] 현수 (HYUN SU) - 차라리 널 몰랐었다면 (IF)
snippet.description:
POP from Seoul Music
HYUN SU (현수) Interview

-
▶ Artist Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/hyunsu_official
▶️ Apple Music : https://apple.co/2lI3nAk
▶ Spotify : https://spoti.fi/2kb1N9z
-
“If” is the first single for the upcoming ballad singer “HYUN SU.” 

This song was a collaborative effort between HYUN SU and the K-pop producing team, “Captain Planet” who has made hits from numerous Korean artists such as Kang Min-kyung's "Because I Love You" including Davichi and SG Wannabe, etc. 

The lyrics are written by HYUN SU and its an honest expression of the emotional toll one has at the end of a relationship. HYUN SU just challenged acting through his first music video and plans to do various acting activities as well.

발라드의 계보를 이을 차세대 발라더 ‘#현수’ 의 첫 싱글 [차라리 널 몰랐었다면]

절제된 감성과, 세련된 표현으로 새롭게 다가올 차세대 남자 발라더 ‘#현수’
멋스러운 꾸밈보다는 솔직하고 담백하게 담은 가삿말과 절제된 듯하지만 마음을 울리는 현수의 감성적인 목소리가 돋보이는 곡이다.
일렉트릭 사운드를 배제한 어쿠스틱 사운드만으로 그의 감성을 극대화했으며, 감성적인 스트링 편곡과 최고의 세션맨들의 연주, 그리고 목소리에 더 집중할 수 있는 편곡으로 ‘현수’의 담담하게 풀어내는 감성을 부각시켰다.
본인이 직접 가사에 참여해 진정성을 더했으며, 프로듀싱팀 ‘캡틴플래닛’ 과의 협업으로 시너지를 극대화했다.

[ALBUM CREDIT]
Artist    현수
Executive Producer 이홍석
Album Producer  ER Contents Media Group
Co-Producer  장형철 for QUAN Entertainment
Music Producer  캡틴플래닛
Contents Business Director  황진 for QUAN Entertainment
Management   이재현, 윤인식, 김정호 for QUAN Entertainment
Marketing  이민영, 윤선우, 박신우 for QUAN Entertainment
Video Production 김기범 for ER Contents Media Group
                                타이슨 권, 장원, 우현빈 for QUAN Entertainment
Administration  김미해 for QUAN Entertainment
Public Relation  HNS HQ
Artwork Design  조인옥, 김영아, 고경화 for STUDIO ONSIL
Music Video  VISHOP for VIKINGS LEAGUE
Photograph   박지만 for STUDIO 3RDBASS 
Stylist    배진영, 오영진
Hair    선희, 서연 for STYLE FLOOR
Make-up   법준 for STYLE FLOOR

SONG CREDIT 
Lyrics by   현수, 캡틴플래닛 
Composed by  캡틴플래닛 
Arranged by  캡틴플래닛
Guitar    이병호 
Drums    장혁 
Bass   이태윤 
Piano    최수지 
Strings    융스트링 (arranged by 최수지)
Chorus   소울맨
Recording Engineer  최다인, 이찬미 @ SEOUL STUDIO
이병호, 최수지 @ 캡틴뭉치스튜디오
Mixing Engineer  정기홍 @ SEOUL STUDIO
Mastering Engineer  전훈 @ SONIC KOREA
-
▶ About HYUN SU

HYUN SU is a male vocalist who debuted with his ballad single “If,” in September 2019. 
He majored in applied music and have many experiences performing while attending college and during his mandatory 2 year service in the Korean navy. Since starting his youtube channel he has gained a large following creating various covers. 
He has also launched an acting career through his debut music video and will pursue other ventures in acting.
HYUN SU is a rare talent whose future is worth looking forward to in the years to come.

Agency: ER CONTENTS MEDIA GROUP, QUAN Entertainment
Category: Male/Solo
Genre: Ballad
Nationality: Republic of Korea
Debut: 09/02/2019, Single “If”
Birth Date: 03/23/1993
Height / Weight: 180cm/71kg
Academic Background: Hanyang University Practical Music 
Hobbies: exercise, reading, writing lyrics, watching movies.
Instruments: Piano, guitar
